Articles.Content:
OK, I had an idea inspired by Lundmunchkins's Interkerbal Space Station! Someone who replies to this can create a KMP server, and we can have a International Program. We can build stations, ground bases, interplanetary bases, anything, really. But, you need my approval for it first. Any un-approved modules docked to a station must be undocked, or approved. For example,

May I have approval to launch a mission to Jool?

Here are pictures.

pics

pics

Then I would reply

Sure, that would be great/ No, modify it in this way.

Ideas?

Note that I did not completely copy Lund, I was inspired by him.
